subtle.$description: Subtle border radius for use of smaller UI elements or those with a slightly less sharp feeling.

soft.$description: Medium border radius for medium sizes UI elements and a softer feeling.

cushiony.$description: Very soft border radius for use of larger elements or elements with a cushiony feeling.

pill.$description: Border radius for UI elements that supports pill shape such as buttons and inputs.

round.$description: Border radius for elements that are meant to always be round

subtle-xs.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a subtle border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings

soft-xs.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a soft border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings

soft-s.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a soft border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings

cushiony-xs.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a cushiony border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings

cushiony-s.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a cushiony border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings

cushiony-m.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a cushiony border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings

soft-s-xs.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a soft border radius and another element with a nested border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings

cushiony-s-xs.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a cushiony border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings

cushiony-m-s.$description: Border radius for corner-aligned elements inside other element with a cushiony border radius and another element with a nested border radius. Designed to follow the curvature of the outer element element in all density and roundness settings
